errorMessages.framerMotion:
You are still seeing this error because either:
1. The wrong version of framer-motion is installed, or
2. node_modules and package-lock.json were not fully deleted before reinstalling.

Please follow these steps EXACTLY:

1. Open PowerShell in your project directory.
2. Run these commands one by one:

   Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules
   Remove-Item -Force package-lock.json
   npm uninstall framer-motion
   npm install framer-motion@5.5.5 --legacy-peer-deps

3. Confirm your package.json contains ONLY:
   "framer-motion": "5.5.5"

4. Run:
   npm install --legacy-peer-deps
   npm start

If you still see the error, please copy the output of
   npm list framer-motion
and share it here.

You still have the wrong version of framer-motion installed.
To fix this error, follow these steps exactly:

// 1. Uninstall framer-motion:
   npm uninstall framer-motion

// 2. Delete node_modules and package-lock.json:
   Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules
   Remove-Item -Force package-lock.json

// 3. Install the correct version for React 17:
   npm install framer-motion@5.5.5 --legacy-peer-deps

// 4. Verify the version:
   npm list framer-motion
   It should show ONLY framer-motion@5.5.5

// 5. Start your server:
   npm start

// Do not change any source code files for this error.
// The problem is only with your dependency version.
